page.title: 06Energy
page.content: Everybody in the block now has electricity although not many use electricity for anything other than lighting. Most people have Agas or Rayburns on which they cook and which provide hot water. Some people area able to run Central Heating from their stoves. Many people burn logs which are collected or purchased locally or they purchase coal from a travelling coal merchant. There is no piped gas at all in the area as we are a long way from the main pipelines. At one time there was a windmill as we have a lane called Mill Lane. Our nearest petrol station is 3 miles away.
